revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #27 Cornn |image = [[File:Cornn.png]] |caption = Its dryness is quite strong. As a result, its true deliciousness can't be appreciated by just eating one or two. |growtime = 2h 30m 0s |harvest = 26 berries |replant = 10% |points = 700 |flavor =
*0 spicy *20 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Cornn''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Leppa]], at least 1 [[Bluk]] and at least 1 [[Wiki]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 18 mins 20 secs || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 13 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 30 mins - 5 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CornnTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CornnTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CornnTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 hours 30 mins -
5 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 1 hour 40 mins -
3 hours 20 mins || 20 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 6 mins 7 secs -
2 hours 12 mins 13 secs || 16 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Cornn berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |-style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Leppa.png|30px]]

No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Wiki]] || - || - || - |- | [[Bluk]] || 5 mins 30 secs until ripe || 3 mins 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Leppa]] || 4 mins until ripe || 2 mins 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |} {{Berries}}
